entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:36 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 2:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:45 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm over southwestern sections. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 12:45 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:45 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
